column4: is there a step-by-step guide to Apache 2.0 on ubuntu Edgy Eft?  From zero to hero--
I've got the install down, now I need a setup with DynDNS.com for my homepage
My DynDNS is already configured but apache isn't serving
yes, but you have to set your router first
yes, i can see so, how is your LAN setup?
is the modem set to pppoe?
okay... now you have to route all incomming traffic at port 80 to your server's ip
yes, but does the modem route the traffic to your server? or does it stop there?
